mean_en: a person who works to change and improve a society, government, etc.
word_etyma: re重新 + form 形状 + er表人 → reformer改革家
short_phrase: Martin Luther King Jr. was a great reformer.
sentence: Martin Luther King, Jr. was the greatest reformer of the Civil Rights Movement.
sentence_trans: 马丁·路德·金是最伟大的公民权利运动改革者。
